description: Number of self-complementary 2-colored bracelets (turn over necklaces) with 2n beads.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
E. M. Palmer and R. W. Robinson, Enumeration of self-dual configurations Pacific J. Math., 110 (1984), 203-221.
F. Ruskey, Necklaces, Lyndon words, De Bruijn sequences, etc.
Index entries for sequences related to bracelets
mathematica: a[n_] := (1/2)*(2^(n-1) + Total[ EulerPhi[2*#]*2^(n/#) &  /@ Divisors[n]]/(2*n)); Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 33}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 25 2011 *)
crossrefs: Different from, but easily confused with, A045690 and A093371.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
